messages.message: Invalid sample bitOffset for BasisLZ/ETC1S texture in the basic DFD block.
messages.details: DFD block #1 sample #2 bitOffset in basic DFD block is 65 but for BasisLZ/ETC1S textures it must be 64.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
